page.title: 03EDUCATION IN BRORA
page.content: THERE ARE THREE SCHOOLS IN BRORA. THE FIRST ONE IS PLAY SCHOOL.WHICH IS A SMALL BUILDING SITUATED ON THE OUTSKIRTS OF BRORA.CHILDREN FROM THE AGE OF THREE GO THERE TO PLAY WITH OTHER CHILDREN AND GET THEMSELVES USED TO BEING SEPARATED FROM THEIR PARENTS FOR A FEW HOURS. THE SECOND SCHOOL IS NURSERY SCHOOL. AT THE AGE OF FOUR,CHILDREN GO TO NURSERY SCHOOL WHICH IS PART OF THE MAIN SCHOOL BUILDING.THEY GO THERE FOUR TIMES A WEEK TO LEARN ABOUT THE THINGS THEY SHALL BE DOING IN HIGHER CLASSES. THE THIRD SCHOOL IS PRIMARY WHERE YOU GO AFTER NURSERY SCHOOL.YOU WOULD BE FIVE IN PRIMARY ONE,THERE ARE SEVEN CLASSES AND AFTER THE LAST CLASS YOU THEN GO INTO SECONDARY ONE AND THEN TWO.THERE ARE ONLY TWO SECONDARY CLASSES IN BRORA.
